PhpFile.title: PhpFile
PhpFile.description: Represents a PHP file uploaded for refactoring.

id.description: Unique identifier for the PhpFile entity.

fileName.description: The original name of the uploaded PHP file.

fileContent.description: The content of the uploaded PHP file.

uploadTimestamp.description: The timestamp when the file was uploaded.

RefactoringTask.title: RefactoringTask
RefactoringTask.description: Represents a refactoring task performed on a PHP file.

id.description: Unique identifier for the RefactoringTask entity.

phpFileId.description: Reference to the unique identifier of the original PhpFile being refactored. (Relationship: PhpFile 1:N RefactoringTask)

originalCode.description: The original PHP code before refactoring.

compatibilityReportId.description: Reference to the unique identifier of the associated CompatibilityReport entity, if generated. (Relationship: RefactoringTask 1:1 CompatibilityReport)

refactoringTimestamp.description: The timestamp when the refactoring was performed.

cloudStorageUrl.description: The URL of the refactored file saved in Google Cloud Storage, if saved.

CompatibilityReport.title: CompatibilityReport
CompatibilityReport.description: Represents a compatibility report generated after refactoring a PHP file.

id.description: Unique identifier for the CompatibilityReport entity.

refactoringTaskId.description: Reference to the unique identifier of the related RefactoringTask entity. (Relationship: RefactoringTask 1:1 CompatibilityReport)

reportContent.description: The content of the compatibility report, highlighting potential issues and changes made.

generationTimestamp.description: The timestamp when the report was generated.

pdfUrl.description: The URL of the PDF version of the report, if generated.

cloudStorageUrl.description: The URL of the compatibility report saved in Google Cloud Storage, if saved.

CloudBucketScan.title: CloudBucketScan
CloudBucketScan.description: Represents a scan of a Google Cloud Storage bucket for PHP files to refactor.

id.description: Unique identifier for the CloudBucketScan entity.

bucketName.description: The name of the Google Cloud Storage bucket to scan.

directoryPath.description: The directory path within the bucket to scan. If null, the entire bucket is scanned.

scanTimestamp.description: The timestamp when the bucket scan was initiated.

phpFileIds.description: Array of identifiers for PhpFile entities found during the bucket scan. (Relationship: CloudBucketScan 1:N PhpFile)

items.description: Reference to the unique identifier of a PhpFile entity found during the scan.

recursiveScan.description: Whether the file should be recursivley scanned.

params.description: The unique ID of the PHP file.
params.name: phpFileId

params.description: The unique ID of the refactoring task.
params.name: refactoringTaskId

params.description: The unique ID of the compatibility report.
params.name: compatibilityReportId

definition.description: Collection containing cloud bucket scan documents.

params.description: The unique ID of the cloud bucket scan.
params.name: cloudBucketScanId
